```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
speedData <- read.csv("sprint_speed.csv")
speedData
hittingData <- read.csv("expected_stats.csv")
hittingData
rawData <- full_join(hittingData, speedData, by = "player_id")
rawData <- rawData %>%
  rename(woba_diff = est_woba_minus_woba_diff, 
         ba_diff = est_ba_minus_ba_diff, 
         slg_diff = est_slg_minus_slg_diff) %>%
  select(player_id, woba_diff, ba_diff, slg_diff)
```
